mapper.insert:
insert into t_receive(id, user_id, coupon_id, receive_number, receive_time, start_time, end_time, status,use_time, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.userId}, #{item.couponId}, #{item.receiveNumber}, #{item.receiveTime}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.status}, #{item.useTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NOW(), NOW())
